blocks.content:
HKN is an invite-only honor society, and to induct one must receive an invitation. Eligible students must also have a major consisting of ECE, CSE, BENG, MAE, MATH-CS, NANO-EE, and COGS-ML. If you are a COGS-ML student, please email us for instructions.

Additionally, members at the time of induction must fall into one of the following:

* top 1/3 of their senior standing or graduate student class
* top 1/4 of their junior standing class
* top 1/5 of their senior standing class
